The original post attributes the cause of the writer's bad mood to the absence of their favorite person, Cici. This is an internal attributional style, as it implies that the writer's emotions are directly influenced by their personal relationships.

In the transferred post, we change the attribution to an external factor - the fact that life can still feel dull without the people we love by our side, even on the brightest days. This shifts the focus from the writer's personal relationships to the external circumstance of life's unpredictability and the impact of external factors on our emotions.
